"How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet 
                                                                           86
of him that bringeth good tidings, that publisheth peace; that bringeth good tidings of good, that publisheth salvation; that saith unto Zion, Thy God reigneth! Thy watchmen shall lift up the voice; with the voice together shall they sing; for they shall see eye to eye, when the Lord shall bring again Zion." Isaiah 52:7, 8. Thus is portrayed the happiness and grace that will be revealed when unity and love abide in the church. 


     A Lesson From Christ's Attitude Toward Judas.
